titles.title: Expressing the Nation's sincerest appreciation for the service of the World War II Filipino veterans who fought in the Armed Forces on the 67th anniversary of President Franklin D. Roosevelt's military order.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 7/31/2008--Introduced. Honors and extends sincere appreciation to the veterans of the Philippine Commonwealth Army during World War II for their sacrifice to the United States during a time of war, and for their selfless service.
